cause.description:
For all those who think that the free world is wasting food and that food should not be wasted. After all, millions of people in the world are starving.
In addition to your own conservation, you may donate to the featured charity, WORLD VISION. For decades, it has been heavily involved in famine relief and other noble deeds all around the world.
To see more, visit http://donate.wvus.org/OA_HTML/xxwvibeCCtpItmDspRte.jsp?section=10023&item=1332408
1. Food must be eaten, not wasted.
2. Everyone in the world has the right to eat and not to starve.
cause.mission: become more efficient in managing food so as to not waste resources.
cause.name: Stop Wasting Food
